result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Mourad M.M. Fahim

records.addlTxt: Final pre-trial on February 28, 2023 at 01:00 pm.
Jury trial on February 8, 2023 at 08:30 am.

Atty Getsinger acknowledges rec. information, waives reading and stands mute.  Court advises DE of charges/max penalties in 22CF415.  Court enters NG pleas.  Atty Getsinger states matters should be placed on the JT noting the parties are working on a resolution.  State is in agreement.  Matters will be placed on the JT calendar.  Bonds continued.

1:40 PM Defendant Mourad M.M. Fahim in court.  Attorney Annie E Getsinger in court for Mourad M.M. Fahim.  Prosecuting attorney Rick C Spoentgen in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty Getsinger received and waives reading of Information.  DE advised of charges and penalties.  Atty Getsinger Stands Mute, Court enters Not Guilty Plea.
Return date scheduled for October 27, 2022 at 11:15 am.
Return date on October 27, 2022 at 11:15 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Mourad M.M. Fahim
Current: 1130 Second Street, Baraboo, WI 53913 United States  (Effective: 08-03-2022)
Prior: 8850 Blackhawk Rd, # 216, Middleton, WI 53562

9:33 AM Prosecuting attorney Michael X. Albrecht in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Mourad M.M. Fahim in court.  Attorney Annie E Getsinger in court for Mourad M.M. Fahim.  Court states cases and appearances.  Atty Getsinger states they will waive the right to a prelim today.  DE agrees.  Court questions DE on prelim waiver/accepts/finds probable cause/binds DE over.  Atty Getsinger requests ARGN be set out.  Bond continued.
Arraignment scheduled for August 25, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Preliminary hearing on June 23, 2022 at 09:30 am.

01:50 PM Defendant Mourad M.M. Fahim in court with attorney Annie E Getsinger.  Gabriel David Arevalo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty Getsinger requests prelim.  Bond continued.  All matters to track.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 23, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Return date on April 22, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: No use or possession of firearm. No use or possession of controlled substances w/o a valid Rx & take all Rx as prescribed

Pre-trial conference on March 11, 2022 at 11:45 am.
Return date on April 12, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

03:10 PM Defendant Mourad M.M. Fahim by Zoom audio and video from LEC with attorney Annie E Getsinger by Zoom audio and video.  Defendant Mourad M.M. Fahim in custody.  Gabriel David Arevalo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant received and waives reading of complaint.  Court advises DE of charges/max penalties.  Advised of rights to an attorney.  DE does not qualify for public defender representation.  Time limits waived for preliminary hearing.  State recommends a signature bond.  Atty Getsinger does not object.  $2,000.00 SIGNATURE bond set.  Special bond conditions as follows:  No use or possession of a firearm.  No use or possession of a controlled substance without a valid Rx and take all medications as prescribed.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for March 11, 2022 at 11:45 am.  Return date scheduled for April 12, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
